graphs.query: tag contains 'audit' | group count() by userEmail | sort -count | limit 10
graphs.title: Top Searches by User

graphs.query: tag contains 'audit' | columns timestamp, userEmail, action, filter | sort -timestamp | limit 50
graphs.title: Recent Searches

graphs.query: tag contains 'audit' action='getDashboardV2' | columns timestamp, user, dashboardName, ip | sort -timestamp | limit 50
graphs.title: Dashboard Access Log

graphs.query: tag contains 'audit' action='docsData' | columns timestamp, user, ip | sort -timestamp | limit 50
graphs.title: Documentation Access Log
